Job Description: As a member of the engineering team you will be responsible for coming uptospeed quickly on the tools and technologies we use, and will be expected to contribute to the product quickly.    This role could entail working on many different parts of our platform, and being responsible for designing and implementing new features that will deliver value to our customers.    This could be really anywhere in our tech stack, from the front-end (React), back-end (Java, Node, SQL, ES, Redis, etc.).     What You will be Doing:    Working in a fast-paced environment, designing and implementing new features to our core product quickly   Designing scalable solutions to handle our ever increasing user base   Working with a wide range of systems, processes, and technologies to own and solve problems from end-to-end   Building new features for internal and external users   Learning new technologies quickly   Managing a team, mentor, guide coach the team    What We would like you to Have:    1-3 years experience with high quality backend and/or frontend code to a production environment   Solid knowledge of NodeJS, JavaScript    Experience with Spring application framework   Experience with SQL data stores (we use PostgreSQL)   Experience with ReactJS user interface library   Experience working with APIs and integrating with cloud services   Disciplined approach to testing and quality assurance   Lead and mentored a team    BS or MS in Computer Science, Computer/Electrical Engineering or equivalent work experience    Bonus Points for:    Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
